tha-ap514:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap514:2.4_0: and the fruit of good and results.
tha-ap514:3.1_0: My defilements have been burnt away by practicing absorption—
tha-ap514:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap514:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kakkaṭa.
tha-ap514:7.1_0: The second fruit of the senior monks have been brought out;
